title: 8 Halloween costumes you can create without having to buy anything new
text:
I’ve always been a bit of a failure at Halloween. While many of my friends adore the opportunity to get creative with face paints and elaborate outfits, great costumes require careful planning and I always leave it too late to think of anything funny or clever.

For last-minute Halloween party-goers like me, the options are limited, and many of us end up with a cheap fancy dress store costume that will only be worn once, is near impossible to recycle and will inevitably end up contributing to the £140 million worth of clothing sent to landfill every year.

This issue was spotlighted last week by The Fairyland Trust, which revealed that around 7 million Halloween costumes are disposed of each year...
description: I’ve always been a bit of a failure at Halloween.
